---
title: "Fifa Data"
description: |
  Analysis of FIFA attendance data from TidyTuesday
author: Josh Goldhaber
date: September 24, 2025
format: html
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

fifa <- read_csv("data/week11_fifa_audience.csv", show_col_types = FALSE)

ggplot(fifa, aes(x = population_share, y = tv_audience_share, color = confederation)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.7, size = 3) +
  geom_abline(slope = 1, intercept = 0, linetype = "dashed", color = "red") +
  scale_x_log10(labels = scales::percent_format(accuracy = 0.01)) +
  scale_y_log10(labels = scales::percent_format(accuracy = 0.01)) +
  labs(
    title = "FIFA World Cup: Population Share vs. TV Audience Share (log10 scale)",
    x = "Share of World Population (log scale)",
    y = "Share of World Cup TV Audience (log scale)",
    color = "Confederation"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()


```
